title: Please Preserve Old Galio
body:
I have mained Galio for countless months, and it saddens me greatly to see that the Sentinel's Sorrow is on his way out.  New Galio bears little resemblance to current ""Galio,"" with a radically different playstyle, appearance, voiceover, and personality.  I feel in love with Galio's "humble protector" personality.  New ""Galio"" looks fun as his own champion, but old Galio shouldn't be removed to make way for him.

{{champion:3}} {{item:3070}}

Highschoolers had traditional sion done and modded as a fully realized custom skin in a school weeks worth of lunch breaks. The custom VO was done two days after PBE was updated. 
Traditional skins arent hard. Theyre just the old voice lines and recoloring with slightly different textures. 

Riot classifies a RELAUNCH as a re-release of a champion with an entirely new kit, background, personality, and model that is unrecognizable from the previous. 
Poppy, sion, karma, and yorick are COMPLETELY unrecognizable from what they were before, with minimal similarities. They are, in essence, an entirely NEW champion. 

Shen, warwick, and malzahar are reworks because even though their kits were changed, they were STILL recognizable as what they were before and retained their personality.

they did the same with {{champion:78}} and it's really stupid. Yeah, poppy's old kit was toxic(well really it was just her passive and ult), but there was NOTHING wrong with her as a character. I think they actually did a decent job visually by keeping her similar to her old design with some really good updates to visuals like her armor. However, she isn't poppy. she is a new champion that was "influenced" by the "real poppy". It really just grinds my gears cause it completely unnecessary. These champs are getting reworks because their gameplay is bad, not their character. Also, we know now that riot is certainly capable of doing a proper rework as evidence by the new {{champion:99}} VO. This is what should be done with all reworks that involve new VO's. Lux is still the same character she was just updated and refined to draw out her character more than her old VO. As an {{champion:28}} main i feel you man, cause she is right behind galio to getting her chacter axed by a "rework"(aka champion replacement).
i really hated his overbearing immunity to my spells and his ultimate was cancer. good riddance.
